sn48.19:1: Then a certain bhikkhu approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said to him:
sn48.19:2: "Venerable sir, it is said, ‘one equipped with faculties, one equipped with faculties.’[n.03] SeeSN35.154.In what way, venerable sir, is one equipped with faculties?"sn.v.03
